column2: When ConocoPhillips announced in September it would purchase Royal Dutch Shell’s Permian business for $9.5 billion cash, CEO Ryan Lance said his company would start selling off other oil and gas producing acreage to the tune of $4 billion to $5 billion by 2023.
column3: Business/American City Business Journals•11 hours ago
column4: ConocoPhillips to sell Permian Basin assets to another Houston-based co. for $440M
